resources.string: While not required, it is recommended that you connect to a network to gain the full benefits of this app.
cannot work without a network connection. Please check your network settings if you want to use this feature.
Your PIN feature is disabled. You can still follow your friends, but they will not be able to follow you. Enable a My Location source in System Settings to use it.
Cannot display your location. Enable a My Location source in System Settings to use it.
Your location is not currently on this map.
